nodes.bodyText: we used to have couple workers. Maybe let's use 2 workers?

multinode has exactly one worker. https://github.com/prestosql/presto/blob/3969f932df91acbae20778f091aa137f66868b18/presto-product-tests/conf/docker/multinode/docker-compose.yml
(eg multinode-tls has 2 workers, but that's separate thing)

can we take image from presto-master container? The best would be to copy presto-master and modify what is needed? Or maybe we need to have a base presto container that could be used to setup coordinator and worker?

can we take image from presto-master container?

Yes, that's possible, but that would introduce uncertaintly to the code -- image is a mutable attribute
This class needs to know what it is setting.
What is the issue here? I am afraid this is not the only one such test?

Yes, I am afraid so too.
I started setting up SSH client, which would address this in a generic manner, but didn't finish.
I think we could try to merge metastore and hdfs impersonation into single environment and have single environment with no impersonation. Maybe  a follow up?

Certainly a follow up.
I don't want to introduce unnecessary changes during this refactoring.
